allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add enhanced particle effects for spells and combat

- Created comprehensive ParticleConfigs library with 30+ effect presets
- Implemented SpellEffects plugin with fire, ice, lightning, holy, and dark magic
- Implemented CombatEffects plugin with hit impacts, damage numbers, and death effects
- Support for all damage types with color-coded visual feedback
- Spell effects include: fireball, frost nova, lightning bolt, heal, and more
- Combat effects include: critical hits, blocks, dodges, and death explosions
- Configurable particle emitters with custom colors, lifespans, and behaviors
- Auto-cleanup timers for all particle emitters
- Blend modes for realistic additive lighting effects

Spell Types:
- Fire: Fireball, flame wave, fire trail
- Ice: Ice shard, frost nova, frozen ground
- Lightning: Lightning bolt, chain lightning, static field
- Holy: Heal, divine shield, resurrection
- Poison/Dark: Poison cloud, shadow bolt, curse

Combat Effects:
- Damage-type-specific hit impacts (physical, fire, ice, lightning)
- Critical hit effects with screen shake
- Block/parry deflection sparks
- Floating damage numbers color-coded by type
- Death explosions and blood splatters (optional)
- Miss and dodge text feedback

Environmental Effects:
- Rain, snow, lava bubbles, water splashes
- Torch flames, dust clouds, fog/mist
- Weather system integration ready

Closes #42
EOF
)")
